control_attributes.Control: MA-5 (2) SECURITY CLEARANCES FOR CLASSIFIED SYSTEMS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization ensures that personnel performing maintenance and diagnostic activities on an information system processing, storing, or transmitting classified information possess security clearances and formal access approvals for at least the highest classification level and for all compartments of information on the system.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization restricts access to [Assignment: organization-defined types of digital and/or non-digital media] to [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].

Control Statement: The organization ensures that personnel performing maintenance and diagnostic activities on an information system processing, storing, or transmitting classified information possess security clearances and formal access approvals for at least the highest classification level and for all compartments of information on the system.
Control Name: MA-5 (2) SECURITY CLEARANCES FOR CLASSIFIED SYSTEMS
